page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content:
At home it is very boring ,the only thing to do is sit and watch television .I've got lots of toys and games but I never use them.All I do is sit and eat food. My house is not brick ,we have a double glazed door and front window.Our garden has got flowers and the back garden has got a fish pond.
Room 1. Living room. Sofa,TV,Hi-Fi. Room 2. Kitchen.Cooker,Fridge,Washing machine,Cupboards. Room 3. Toilet.Bath,Sink. Room 4. 1 bed,Drawers,Cupboards. Room 5. 3 beds.Drawers,Cupboards. Room 6. 1 bed.Drawers,Cupboards.
For leisure I play football and athletics.Our family does not go to church.
